name: Oleg Domanov
summary: Senior Frontend & Full-Stack Developer with 9+ years of experience building scalable web applications and e-commerce solutions. Expert in React, Next.js, Node.js, and modern JavaScript frameworks. Proven track record delivering 50+ web applications, mentoring development teams, and optimizing performance, UX, and scalability. Collaborative leader passionate about transforming business ideas into high-quality technical solutions.

experience.title: Senior Frontend & Full-Stack Developer
experience.summary: You have 9+ years of experience in frontend and full-stack development, working across multiple roles from Frontend Developer to Senior Full-Stack Developer. Your expertise spans React, Next.js, Node.js, modern JavaScript frameworks, and various backend technologies. You also have leadership experience mentoring teams and optimizing applications.
highlights: 9+ years in frontend and full-stack development.
Strong skills in React, Next.js, Node.js, JavaScript, TypeScript, and modern web technologies.
Experience in building and optimizing web applications and e-commerce solutions.
Leadership experience mentoring developers and leading technical teams.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.summary: Expanded my skillset to Vue.js and full-stack development, building dynamic, component-driven applications with Vuex for state management and Vue Router for smooth navigation. Focused on code reusability, UI performance, and responsive design. Worked with TypeScript, SCSS, and Tailwind CSS to streamline development and ensure visual consistency.
highlights: Built dynamic, data-driven UIs using Vue 2/3, Vuex, and Vue Router.
Created reusable component libraries and improved code reusability.
Optimized performance by implementing SSR and code-splitting.
Worked closely with backend developers to integrate APIs and ensure seamless data flow.
Improved UI/UX through animations, transitions, and accessibility practices.
Developed full-stack applications with modern JavaScript frameworks.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.summary: Advanced into full-stack development using Angular and Node.js, where I architected enterprise-grade web applications and dashboards. Implemented modular components, dependency injection, and RxJS-based data flows for high performance and maintainability. Collaborated with design and backend teams to translate complex business logic into intuitive user interfaces.
highlights: Built and maintained complex full-stack applications using Angular (v8â€“v16), Node.js, and TypeScript.
Designed reusable components and custom directives to speed up development.
Implemented RxJS observables, lazy loading, and route guards for performance and security.
Developed RESTful APIs and optimized HTTP requests for efficiency.
Collaborated in Agile teams and contributed to code reviews and architecture decisions.

experience.title: Frontend Developer
experience.summary: Began my career mastering HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, building responsive and accessible user interfaces. Focused on clean structure, reusable components, and creating layouts that worked across all devices and browsers. Developed strong UI/UX fundamentals and attention to design precision while learning backend technologies.
highlights: Developed fully responsive layouts using HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.
Implemented pixel-perfect designs and optimized pages for performance.
Focused on accessibility, semantic markup, and clean code structure.
Collaborated with designers to translate mockups into live interfaces.
Gained strong understanding of frontend fundamentals and design principles.

education.description: Major concentration in Software Development, Algorithm Design, and Database Management Systems with distinction.
